name: Teacher
body: Hello students! I'm here to help with any questions you have.

name: John Doe
body: Hey, is anyone available to help with a math doubt?

name: Alice Johnson
body: Sure, I can help! What's the doubt?

name: Bob Smith
body: I'm also here to help with any questions!

name: Emily Chen
body: I'm stuck with a programming problem. Can someone assist me?

name: John Doe
body: Thanks, Alice! Here's the math doubt:

name: Alice Johnson
body: To find the roots, you can use the quadratic formula: x = (-b ± √(b² - 4ac)) / 2a

name: Emily Chen
body: I can help you with the programming problem. Please share the details.

name: Bob Smith
body: Sure, let me know what you need assistance with.

name: Emily Chen
body: I'm trying to implement a bubble sort algorithm, but my array doesn't seem to be sorting correctly.
